name: Totem Guard
description:
Only your skill and strategic thinking will save the land of the Totems, strange creatures that will follow your every order to destroy enemies.

Water, fire, wind and earth totems can be combined to create new and powerful elemental forms.

Get ready for 90 levels filled with ghosts and spirits inspired by different cultures of the world, each one has an iconic style and original score.

Throughout your adventure you'll find obstacles that will put your intellect to the test. Move your totems wisely in order to find the best path to beat your foes with the least moves possible.

Made by Golden Pie Studios.

Match Puzzle game for Android and iOS. Created with Unity.

I worked some game design and half of the level design for this game.

Please review it in the store if you check it out, thanks.
